Package cams.dashboards

Interface DashboardState

All Known Subinterfaces:
PostApproverUI, PosterUI, PostReplierUI, PostViewerUI
All Known Implementing Classes:
ApproverUI, CommitteeUI, EnquirerUI, LogoutState, OrganiserUI, ReplierUI, StaffUI, StudentUI, SuggesterUI, UserUI
public interface DashboardState
Represents a state of the Dashboard

This interface is part of the State design pattern and is used to define different states (e.g., logged in, logged out, viewing enquiries) of the Dashboard. Each state has its own implementation of how to display itself.

Implementing classes should define the specific behavior of the dashboard when it is in that particular state.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void display​(Dashboard dashboard)
    Displays the UI associated with a particular state of the dashboard.

  • Method Details

    • display

      void display​(Dashboard dashboard)
      Displays the UI associated with a particular state of the dashboard.

      This method is responsible for rendering the user interface and handling any interactions specific to the state. Implementations might include displaying menus, handling user input, or transitioning to other states.

      Parameters:
      dashboard - The Dashboard context in which this state operates.
